pullrequest.title: Move boost libraries in pkg-config to Libs.private

content.raw: Reviewing this change now seems to me that I was wrong when I propose it. I see that we are still exposing boost in many of the gazebo headers so it makes little sense to declare it private. Sorry for the noise thanks for catching the error.
content.html: Reviewing this change now seems to me that I was wrong when I propose it. I see that we are still exposing boost in many of the gazebo headers so it makes little sense to declare it private. Sorry for the noise thanks for catching the error.
